Position Title:             Social Media SpecialistEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 8K AED all inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client:A Dubai-based Indian modern snack bar mainly serving samosas, other Indian snacks and sweets. Job Description:Platform Management: Manage and optimize our social media presence on platforms LinkedIn, Twitter, TikTok , You Tube and Instagram. This includes regular posting, monitoring engagement, responding to comments and messages, and building a strong online community.
Brand Reputation Management: Monitor online conversations and respond to any potential issues or inquiries in a timely and professional manner, maintaining a positive brand image.
Influencer Partnerships: Identify and establish partnerships with influencers, industry experts while staying up to date with the latest social media trends and industry best practices.
Collaboration: Coordinate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, and product, to ensure cohesive messaging and branding across all channels
Content Creation: Generate compelling and visually appealing content using creative AI tools. This includes creating images, graphics, videos, and written content.Skills
